sentences.sentence: I noticed that this was part of the podcast series.
sentences.translation: 我注意到这只是播客系列的一部分。

sentences.sentence: On Saturday, I did a podcast with my brother and his girlfriend.
sentences.translation: 这星期六，我和弟弟，还有他女朋友，做了一个播客节目。

sentences.sentence: I mean, television, radio, these days podcast and film, there's just an embarrassment of richness.
sentences.translation: 我认为，电视、收音机，现在的播客、电影，资源多到让你困惑。
